items.sentence: My mom really wanted me to become a doctor.
Could you please help me light the candles?
We should've stayed in Boston until Monday.
It would be easy enough for you to do that.
I still go to Boston at least once a month.
I need to get home before it gets too late.
Tom said that he'd explain the rules to me.
I wish that I'd never lent Tom my umbrella.
About how many eggs do your hens lay a day?
Tom always has a million ideas in his head.
Tom played video games instead of studying.
Tom isn't interested in playing videogames.
Let's hope that that's not going to happen.
Tom has been told that he ought to do that.
I had no idea Tom would be able to do that.
For the time being, Tom is staying with us.
Tom took a sip of tea, trying to calm down.
I still need to buy Tom a birthday present.
I don't believe Tom's stories about Boston.
Tom got into trouble for disobeying orders.
Tom turned off the light and left the room.
Tom turned the light off and left the room.
Tom received a push in the right direction.
Tom thinks that Mary might know the answer.
The bank has loaned the company $1,000,000.
During the winter, I sleep with two quilts.
An old friend came to my house for a visit.
Did you download the apps I told you about?
Tom doesn't have to do that, but Mary does.
Why don't we go outside and sit in the sun?
Why don't you get a job like everyone else?
In general, little girls are fond of dolls.
Tom was the only one who didn't want to go.
Tom doesn't want to finish what he's doing.
Tom doesn't think he can do that right now.
I don't know when Tom and Mary got married.
Do Tom and Mary usually eat the same thing?
Tom isn't the only one here who knows Mary.
Tom is too old to be doing that on his own.
Tom is sure Mary knew he wanted to do that.
Tom is supposed to be helping me right now.
Tom is supposed to be helping Mary do that.
Tom is still waiting for Mary to get there.
Tom is never going to do that again, is he?
Tom is likely to be about three hours late.
Tom is late because his car ran out of gas.
Tom is going to visit Mary in the hospital.
Tom is doing things he's never done before.
Tom will be here until the end of the week.
Tom will be going to the dentist on Monday.
